MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA9 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Bourne Gardens, Emmett Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:59PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required due to a underground cable fault. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 06:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:37PM on 28th February 2021.
